title: Star Hammer Tactics v1.0
description:
This is: Star Hammer Tactics v1.0

Turn-based tactical space warfare stuff going on here. I dig it. It's a pretty easy-to-learn game, too... and with hotseat multiplayer and a legit campaign mode to boot! GET IT!!!!!!!
--------------------------------------


Description:
When Novus falls, will you be its saviour?

Take command of the infamous NSG-14 as Lieutenant Fredan Dyce in Campaign mode, or battle your friends for supremacy in 'hotseat' Skirmish mode. With every ship of Naval Strike Group 14 under your direct command, launch missiles to annihilate your enemies from afar or close in for explosive ship-to-alien broadsides.

Key Features:
--Engaging turn-based tactical battles: individually control each ship in your fleet
--Easy-to-learn rules; learn to play in minutes!
--OPERATION STAR HAMMER : In this epic Campaign, play as Lieutenant Fredan Dyce, earn promotions within the Alliance Navy and come face-to-face with the single greatest threat to the safety of your homeworld, Novus.
--Skirmish modes : create your own custom fleet, then duel against a friend in "hotseat" multiplayer, or take on the challenging AI


System Requirements:
CPU Cores: Single Core 500 MHz
Minimum RAM: 1GB
DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0
Graphics Card RAM: 128MB
Graphics Card: DirectX 9.0
Graphics Card Shader Model: 2.0
Sound Card: DirectX 9
Operating System(s):
Windows XP, 64 bit, Windows Vista, 32 bit, Windows Vista, 64 bit, Windows 7, 32 bit, Windows 7, 64 bit


--------------------------------------
